name: Virtual Carpal Tunnel Surgery
description:
*** RANKED #1 HEALTH & FITNESS APP IN 5 COUNTRIES ***

Surgery Squad’s Virtual Carpal Tunnel Surgery

Take on the role of a Virtual Surgeon – You are in control as you perform limited open carpal tunnel release surgery. Inject, Slice, and Sew your way to relieve carpal tunnel syndrome in this highly interactive educational game!

FEATURES:
* Highly interactive virtual surgery
* Informative introduction on the causes of carpal tunnel syndrome
* Interactive procedure including anesthesia, ligament repair and suturing!
* Recovery tips
* Great for kids & adults
